summary: 1991  was a common year starting on Tuesday of the Gregorian calendar.
full_text: Lewis McGibbon was an English cricketer active from 1950 to 1959 who played for Northamptonshire . He appeared in thirteen first-class matches as a righthanded batsman who bowled right arm medium pace. McGibbon was born in Byker, Newcastle upon Tyne on 8 October 1931 and died in Brampton, Northamptonshire on 22 September 2012. He scored 17 runs with a highest score of 4 and took 33 wickets with a best performance of four for 42.
title: Lewis McGibbon
